content: **jasmine beanie ** ======================================= the jasmine beanie is an easy crochet hat crocheted from the top-down after working the body of the hat you will add ribbing with a join-as-you-go method a full photo tutorial is included in the pattern for how to work the ribbing use any #4/worsted weight yarn and a 5 5mm hook this hat looks great in a solid color in stripes or with a contrasting ribbing for the body of the hat you will use the larger hook size and then change to the smaller hook for the ribbing to ensure a nice snug fit --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2020 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
